overview: The greatest series in adult returns. With a Vengeance! Bah! Rah! Raw! Debbie's back! Debbie, the most successful series in adult returns, Vivid style, with sizzling Sunrise Adams in the title role! Paul Thomas tells the tale of a poor girl in a rich school who rises to top cheerleader, only to be taken down by jealous wannabes. But don't worry. This is one field she knows...
title: Debbie Does Dallas: The Revenge
